sn55.39:1.1: Ekam samayam bhagava sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmim nigrodharame.
sn55.39:1.2: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya yena kaligodhaya sakiyaniya nivesanam tenupasankami; upasankamitva pannatte asane nisidi.
sn55.39:1.3: Atha kho kaligodha sakiyani yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho kaligodham sakiyanim bhagava etadavoca:
sn55.39:2.1: “Catuhi kho, godhe, dhammehi samannagata ariyasavika sotapanna hoti avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana.
sn55.39:2.3: Idha, godhe, ariyasavika buddhe aveccappasadena samannagata hoti—
sn55.39:2.4: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.39:2.7: vigatamalamaccherena cetasa agaram ajjhavasati muttacaga payatapanini vossaggarata yacayoga danasamvibhagarata.
sn55.39:2.8: Imehi kho, godhe, catuhi dhammehi samannagata ariyasavika sotapanna hoti avinipatadhamma niyata sambodhiparayana”ti.
sn55.39:3.1: “Yanimani, bhante, bhagavata cattari sotapattiyangani desitani, samvijjante dhamma mayi, ahanca tesu dhammesu sandissami.
sn55.39:3.3: itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagavati.
sn55.39:3.6: yam kho pana kinci kule deyyadhammam sabbam tam appativibhattam silavantehi kalyanadhammehi”ti.
